hero.ctaSectionTitle: Prêt à entrer dans la légende ?
hero.ctaSectionSubtitle: Créez votre compte, suivez vos équipes préférées et vivez les compétitions autrement, en direct.
hero.title: BET TO LEGEND
hero.description: Bet To Legend est une plateforme de paris E-sport pensée pour les joueurs, les fans et les structures. Notre objectif : rendre les paris E-sport aussi fluides, rapides et sécurisés que le jeu lui-même.

liveBetting.title: Paris E-Sport en direct
liveBetting.description: Suivez les matchs en temps réel, placez vos paris en quelques secondes et gardez le contrôle grâce à une interface claire, responsive et pensée pour limiter la charge cognitive dans les moments clés.

unique.title: Ce qui rend Legend unique
unique.ultraReactiveDescription: Interface optimisée pour les matchs intenses : transitions fluides, délais minimisés et retours visuels clairs pour garder l'utilisateur focus sur l'essentiel.
unique.uxDescription: Architecture en composants (faible charge cognitive), affordances explicites et état de chaque action facilement lisible, même en multi-task (stream + paris).
unique.communitiesDescription: Misez sur vos équipes préférées, suivez vos rosters et partagez vos paris avec votre communauté, tout en gardant un cadre maîtrisé et sécurisé.

mission.title: Notre mission
mission.body1: Créer une expérience de paris E-sport qui respecte le rythme des compétitions, les joueurs et les communautés. Nous voulons réduire la friction à chaque étape : compréhension des cotes, navigation, placements de paris et suivi des résultats.
mission.body2: L’interface est conçue pour accompagner l'utilisateur pendant tout le match : hiérarchie visuelle claire, boutons facilement cliquables (Fitts's law), feedback immédiat sur chaque action et lecture rapide des informations critiques.

product.title: Une plateforme pensée produit
product.readabilityDescription: Contenu structuré, informations essentielles toujours au-dessus de la ligne de flottaison, contrastes conformes aux standards d’accessibilité (WCAG).
product.flowDescription: Mesures anti-fraude, suivi d’historique et transparence sur chaque transaction.

items.label: #1 Transparence
items.description: Des règles claires, des cotes explicites, un historique toujours accessible. Ici, rien n’est caché.

items.label: #2 Responsabilité
items.description: Outils de limitation, rappels et indicateurs pour un usage sain et maîtrisé de la plateforme.

items.label: #3 Pour les joueurs
items.description: Nous venons du jeu, pour les joueurs. L’expérience est pensée pour respecter l’intensité et la magie des compétitions.

hero.ctaSectionSubtitle: Create your account, follow your favorite teams and experience competitions differently, live.
hero.title: BET TO LEGEND
hero.description: Bet To Legend is an esports betting platform built for players, fans and organizations. Our goal: make esports betting as smooth, fast and secure as the game itself.

liveBetting.title: Live esports betting
liveBetting.description: Follow matches in real time, place your bets in seconds and stay in control with a clear, responsive interface designed to reduce cognitive load during key moments.

unique.title: What makes Legend unique
unique.ultraReactiveDescription: Interface optimized for intense matches: smooth transitions, minimized delays and clear visual feedback so users stay focused on what matters.
unique.uxDescription: Component-based architecture (low cognitive load), explicit affordances and clearly readable states for every action, even in multi-task mode (stream + bets).
unique.communitiesDescription: Bet on your favorite teams, follow your rosters and share your bets with your community, all within a controlled and secured environment.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.body1: Create an esports betting experience that respects the pace of competitions, players and communities. We want to reduce friction at every step: understanding odds, navigating, placing bets and tracking results.
mission.body2: The interface is designed to support the user throughout the match: clear visual hierarchy, easily clickable buttons (Fitts's law), instant feedback on each action and fast reading of critical information.

product.title: A product-driven platform
product.readabilityDescription: Structured content, key information always above the fold, and contrast levels aligned with accessibility standards (WCAG).
product.flowDescription: Anti-fraud measures, history tracking and transparency on every transaction.

items.label: #1 Transparency
items.description: Clear rules, explicit odds, and a history that’s always accessible. Nothing is hidden.

items.label: #2 Responsibility
items.description: Limit tools, reminders and indicators to encourage healthy, controlled use of the platform.

items.label: #3 From players, for players
items.description: We come from gaming. The experience is crafted to respect the intensity and magic of competitions.

hero.ctaSectionSubtitle: 계정을 만들고, 좋아하는 팀을 팔로우하며 라이브로 색다른 방식의 경쟁을 즐기세요.
hero.title: BET TO LEGEND
hero.description: Bet To Legend는 선수, 팬, 그리고 팀을 위한 e-스포츠 베팅 플랫폼입니다. 우리의 목표는 e-스포츠 베팅을 게임만큼이나 부드럽고, 빠르고, 안전하게 만드는 것입니다.

liveBetting.title: 라이브 E-스포츠 베팅
liveBetting.description: 경기를 실시간으로 시청하고, 몇 초 만에 베팅을 완료하며, 중요한 순간에도 인지 부하를 줄여주는 명확하고 반응형인 인터페이스로 상황을 완전히 파악하세요.

unique.title: Legend만의 차별점
unique.ultraReactiveDescription: 격렬한 경기 상황을 위해 최적화된 인터페이스: 부드러운 전환, 최소화된 지연, 명확한 시각 피드백으로 사용자가 핵심에 집중할 수 있도록 합니다.
unique.uxDescription: 컴포넌트 기반 아키텍처(낮은 인지 부하), 명확한 어포던스, 스트림과 베팅을 동시에 하는 상황에서도 쉽게 읽히는 상태 표시.
unique.communitiesDescription: 좋아하는 팀에 베팅하고, 로스터를 팔로우하며, 커뮤니티와 베팅을 공유하면서도 통제된 안전한 환경을 유지합니다.

mission.title: 우리의 미션
mission.body1: 대회의 리듬, 플레이어, 커뮤니티를 존중하는 e-스포츠 베팅 경험을 만드는 것. 우리는 배당 이해, 내비게이션, 베팅 과정, 결과 추적까지 모든 단계에서 마찰을 줄이고자 합니다.
mission.body2: 인터페이스는 경기 전체를 함께하는 파트너처럼 설계되었습니다: 명확한 시각적 계층 구조, 쉽게 클릭할 수 있는 버튼(Fitts's law), 각 행동에 대한 즉각적인 피드백, 그리고 중요한 정보의 빠른 판독.

product.title: 프로덕트 중심 플랫폼
product.readabilityDescription: 구조화된 콘텐츠, 화면 상단에 배치된 핵심 정보, 접근성 기준(WCAG)에 맞는 대비.
product.flowDescription: 안티-프로드 장치, 히스토리 추적, 모든 트랜잭션에 대한 높은 투명성.

items.label: #1 투명성
items.description: 명확한 규칙, 이해하기 쉬운 배당, 언제든 확인 가능한 히스토리. 숨겨진 것은 없습니다.

items.label: #2 책임감
items.description: 건강하고 통제된 사용을 돕는 한도 설정, 리마인더, 인디케이터 제공.

items.label: #3 플레이어로부터, 플레이어를 위해
items.description: 우리는 게임 세계에서 왔습니다. 경험 전체가 경쟁의 긴장감과 매력을 존중하도록 설계되어 있습니다.
